name: subsuperscript
title: Subsuperscript
description: Easily enter and copy text to get either the superscript or subscript equivalent
author: varun_aditya

commands.name: subscript
commands.title: Subscriptify
commands.subtitle: Subsuperscript
commands.description: Turn text and numbers into its subscript equivalent

commands.name: superscript
commands.title: Superscriptify
commands.subtitle: Subsuperscript
commands.description: Turn text and numbers into its superscript equivalent

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
